name: Sukûm
description:
Sukûm® is a 2D fantasy adventure game for Windows.

Story

A long time ago, when magic still existed on Earth, far away in the Alqiifar Kingdom, princess Hasania finds her future husband cursed by the hands of the evil genius Iblis.

Features
  • Make your way through the Alqiifar desert to find the Iblis palace.
  • Learn three different magic powers, and combine them to solve mini-puzzles.
  • Fight two evil geniuses.
  • Hand-drawn, graphic novel-styled story.
Background

Sukûm® is the very first game I developed and released as a full game, back in 2002. The game awarded the first prize in a mexican videogame design contest hosted by the Fundación Arturo Rosenblueth: Desafío FAR 2002.

Enjoy and leave a comment!

How To Play

Enter - Go through story pages.

Directional arrows - Move

A - Use singing magic.

S - Use water magic (after you get it).

D - Use ice magic (after you get it).
